articles.title: Gravitas: Scientists awaken 46,000-year-old roundworm from permafrost - WION
articles.description: Scientists have awakened a 46,000-year-old roundworm from a Serbian permafrost. Experts plan to study the roundworm's survival techniques. How did the roundworm survive extreme weather events? Priyanka Sharma brings you a report.

articles.title: Semicon India 2023: Micron investment to create 5,000 direct jobs, says CEO Sanjay Mehrotra - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Micron Technologies plans to invest Rs 825 million over 2 phases of the project appreciative of significant support of central and state government. The combined investment by Micron and government over 2 phases could reach up to 2.75 billion dollars.
